mapper.select: SELECT MMS.PLNT_CD ,MMS.MITM_SPEC_IDX ,MMS.MITM_CD ,SDPROC.DTL_NM AS SPEC_PROC_NM ,MMS.SPEC_PROC_CD ,MMS.DEL_YN ,MMS.USE_VER_YN ,MMS.RVS_NO ,MMS.DOC_NO ,MMS.RVS_DT ,MMS.ENFO_DT ,MMS.RVS_REA_CD ,MMS.RVS_CTT ,MMS.RVS_DIV_PS ,MMS.REVW_UID ,MMS.REVW_DS ,MMS.REVW_IP ,MMS.MITM_SPEC_APR_IDX ,MMS.RJT_UID ,MMS.RJT_DS ,MMS.RJT_REA ,MMAS.AITM_SPEC_VER ,MMAS.AITM_SPEC_IDX ,MM.MITM_WRK_PLC_DIV ,SCTWRK.TREE_NM AS MITM_WRK_PLC_DIV_NM ,MM.MITM_PITM_DIV ,SCTPITM.TREE_NM AS MITM_PITM_DIV_NM ,MM.POINT ,MM.ROOMNO ,MM.GRADE ,SDGRD.DTL_NM AS GRADE_NM ,MM.ANS_CYL_CD ,SAC.ANS_CYL_MARK_NM AS ANS_CYL_NM ,MM.CRG_DPT_CD ,SDPT.DPT_NM AS CRG_DPT_NM ,MM.ANS_STR_DT ,MM.PER_SPEC ,MM.REVW_DUR_TM ,MM.APR_DUR_TM FROM MM_MITM_SPEC MMS LEFT JOIN MM_MITM MM ON MM.PLNT_CD = MMS.PLNT_CD AND MM.MITM_CD = MMS.MITM_CD LEFT JOIN MM_MITM_AITM_SPEC MMAS ON MMS.PLNT_CD = MMAS.PLNT_CD AND MMS.AITM_SPEC_IDX = MMAS.AITM_SPEC_IDX LEFT JOIN SY_CD_DTL SDPROC ON MMS.SPEC_PROC_CD = SDPROC.DTL_CD LEFT JOIN SY_CD_DTL SDGRD ON MM.PLNT_CD = SDGRD.PLNT_CD AND MM.GRADE = SDGRD.DTL_CD LEFT JOIN SY_DPT SDPT ON SDPT.PLNT_CD = MM.PLNT_CD AND SDPT.DPT_CD = MM.CRG_DPT_CD LEFT JOIN SY_ANS_CYL SAC ON SAC.PLNT_CD = MM.PLNT_CD AND MM.ANS_CYL_CD = SAC.ANS_CYL_CD LEFT JOIN SY_CD_TREE SCTWRK ON SCTWRK.PLNT_CD = MM.PLNT_CD AND SCTWRK.TREE_CD = MM.MITM_WRK_PLC_DIV LEFT JOIN SY_CD_TREE SCTPITM ON SCTPITM.PLNT_CD = MM.PLNT_CD AND SCTPITM.TREE_CD = MM.MITM_PITM_DIV WHERE MMS.PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND MMS.DEL_YN = 'N' AND MMS.SPEC_PROC_CD IN (${specProcCd}) AND MM.USE_YN = 'Y' AND MM.DEL_YN = 'N' AND MMS.REVW_UID = #{revwUid} ORDER BY MITM_CD

SELECT MMSA.PLNT_CD , MMSA.AITM_SPEC_IDX , MMSA.AITM_SEQ , M.AITM_KN , MA.VRIA_NO , MA.VRIA_KN , MMSA.ANS_DPT_CD , MMSA.AMITM_CD , MMSA.AITM_ORD , MMSA.PERSPEC_TXT , MMSA.OWC_SPEC_TXT , MMSA.SPEC_TXT_EN , MMSA.SPEC_TYP , MMSA.JDG_TYP , MMSA.PER_SLV_LOW , MMSA.PER_SLV_UPP , MMSA.PER_SLV_DESC , MMSA.OWC_SLV_LOW , MMSA.OWC_SLV_UPP , MMSA.OWC_SLV_DESC , MMSA.SLV_JDG_CFM , MMSA.SLV_JDG_NON_CFM , MMSA.RST_UNIT_CD , MMSA.RST_DPNT , MMSA.RPT_PRT_SLV_VAL , MMSA.RPT_PRT_ITM_NM , MMSA.RPT_PRT_YN , MMSA.ISP_DPT_CD , MMSA.SMP_CLLT_QTY , MMSA.SMP_CLLT_UNIT , MMSA.ISP_DUR_TM , MMSA.EQM_USE_TM FROM MM_MITM_SPEC_AITM MMSA LEFT JOIN MS_AMITM MA ON MMSA.AMITM_CD = MA.AMITM_CD LEFT JOIN MS_AITM M ON SUBSTR(MMSA.AMITM_CD, 0, 6) = M.AITM_CD WHERE MMSA.PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND MMSA.AITM_SPEC_IDX = #{aitmSpecIdx} ORDER BY AITM_ORD
